name: Maze Ed. Lite
description:
Find the key and escape the maze.

Beware of monsters, with cobwebs that immobilize you with the magical fire wizard, or the ground breaking under your feet when passing ...

Infinite levels.

*How to play:
*Get the key and look for the exit.
*To move the hero, touch the screen up, down, left or right.


If you like it, buy the full version. Find my games.
